website_summaries.verdict: This is a highly-reliable spray that kills fleas and keeps them out.
pros: Suited for homes of up to 2,000 sq
ft., this spray uses heavier-than-air molecules to settle into carpets
Effective against a variety of pests, including ticks and cockroaches
Customers love that this spray has little to no odor
cons: May harm pets if they are sprayed directly

customer_reviews.title: Best product out there!
customer_reviews.text: Best product I used to control flea infestation problem. One dead opossum and we had a nightmare. This guy died 5 feet from my back door and within 5 days the house was infested with fleas. After trying two other products over a month, this stuff really did the job after its first application. The others did nothing and were like treating fleas with peanut butter. Now the Precor 2000, it worked within 7 days of application and after following the directions carefully and repeating as required, our problem was solved. Thank You Precor 2000, your product really, really works. And per the directions, you don't need a lot to do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Jack C

customer_reviews.title: Essential for Flea Removal
customer_reviews.text: Once you get fleas in the house, and you have pets who go outside, it is almost impossible to get rid of them. We had a horrible flea infestation from our dogs---both of whom were treated with flea treatments regularly. Washing their beds, shampooing the carpet and drapes did not work. We didn't get completely rid of the fleas until we used this product. You can spray it right on couches, dog beds, carpets, drapes and it doesn't stain or smell too bad. It's a god send.
customer_reviews.author: WuZetian

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works well!
customer_reviews.text: While I did try and array of natural products that helped a little. This product is a heavy hitter!. We only needed to use it once, in conjunction with the monthly protection put on the dog, and finally, the ordeal is over. I think we had fleas in our yard from neighbors pets, because in 14 years, we have only had fleas the last two years, and our dog at 14, really can't walk far and isn't around other animals.
customer_reviews.author: Cman

customer_reviews.title: IGR's and Pyrithrin engineered chemicals are amoung the safest.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. Don't over apply. A minimum of 2 applications will be needed. FOLLOW LABLE CAREFULLY for best results. I used 4 light applications and was flea free in four days and I had a heavy infestation. (Bugman 32 yrs). Good Day
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ziffle

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best
customer_reviews.text: I had a moderate home flea infestation and had tried multiple products from grocery and pet stores. Nothing seemed to work for more than a day or two. I started looking at products online, and saw this one mentioned in an article. I decided to give it a try, and it turned out to be a great decision! Instructions were easy. I followed them exactly. Only took one treatment (I did do the recommended follow-up just in case), but the fleas were gone. Would definitely recommend to anyone who has tried some of the more popular and widely distributed solutions with little or no effect.
customer_reviews.author: GossamerWriter

customer_reviews.title: Spray Can Nozzle Issue..
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok so far- but still verifying results... Most annoying and uncomfortable thing though is having to hold this extra tall can upside down in order to make it function correctly while spraying places like inside our cat condo which is small but still a hide out for fleas. I also seem to find myself constantly getting my spray finger "soaked" while trying to manipulate this odd ball spray nozzle. If this could be redesigned to function in the normal right side up vertical position like everything else is- life could be much better...
customer_reviews.author: glittle

customer_reviews.title: All GONE
customer_reviews.text: This was my last hope before trying to contact a professional. One spray through the house, in two days, ALL GONE. I’ve literally bought everything else to get rid on a flea infestation-bombs, powders, multiple sprays, borax, salt, lemons, new vacuum cleaners, etc. None of it was as effective as this spray. I battled these bionic fleas for two months, spending upwards of $200 before I resorted to this. It works. I promise you. This is the holy grail of flea defense.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey B

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Caught a flea just to test this spray out and see if it really killed them. Spray very light into the container the flea was in. Set the timer 1minute and 9 second and the flea was dead ... Left the residue in the container for about 30 minutes when I came back it was dry as if nothing had been sprayed! So if it doesn't kill your fleas your not doing something right !
customer_reviews.author: G Delacruz

customer_reviews.title: It worked so good that I honestly haven’t thought about it in 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: It worked. I used this last summer and honestly forgot that I bought it because I only had to use it twice. This is pretty much what the exterminator uses and that’s why I bought it. Using the exterminators product and this product did the trick and killed most fleas, but you do need to kill new ones that hatch. I realize I didn’t use this product alone in all areas of the house, but it did work in areas that I used only the Precor Plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Salvatore

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us...recommended by a professional.
customer_reviews.text: We sprayed all base boards. Visible fleas cut way back and then there were none. Will continue to stay on top of what was a flea problem.
customer_reviews.author: JLK

customer_reviews.title: Zoecon Precor 2000 Plus Premise Spray, 16 oz.
customer_reviews.text: anyone that has dogs, should pick this one up. i spray my baseboards and my furniture with this product and no fleas. i've only sprayed once!!!! smells pretty good. if i get fleas back in my house , i will be buying this again!!! it really works.
customer_reviews.author: noreenmosley

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been fighting a flea infestation in our basement. Tried several different sprays, natural remedies and then tried Zoecon Precor. Read the reviews, and was very anxious to finally find a remedy that would work. IT DID NOTHING! Followed directions to the T, next morning, more fleas. It didn’t even knock them down for 24 hours like some other sprays did! And, I bought 2, since it was supposed to be such a great product. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Merrisme

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Works
customer_reviews.text: My grandfather became ill and was taken to the hospital and eventually stayed with my mom and I to pass away, but when he was at the hospital we realized his house was infested with fleas. We called our local bug man and he recommended that we buy these from Amazon to use. We actually ended up using these for our house as we took in my grandfathers two cats before we knew they had fleas, and our house became infested as well. We sprayed and this took care of the flea problem, but we also got each cat a seresto flea collar to kill the fleas on contact while the spray helped kill them within the house and carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Best flea killer ! It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was having a very bad flea issue. I searched around and read the reviews and decided to give Precore a try. While waiting for it to arrive my hubby goes out to Lowe’s and buys raid flea bomb (yeah we were desperate) I decided not to use it since ,bombing the house requires several hours of being gone and the clean up afterwards is tedious. My package arrived in two day and Literally next day after spraying with precore only three fleas. Sprayed the whole house again and no more fleas!! Thank you so much for this product I finally have my house back😊🌞
customer_reviews.author: Florence Miller

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend buying several cans
customer_reviews.text: If you have a flea problem, this should be your first stop. I've had two infestations in 3 years because of stray cats and each time this stuff stopped it dead in its tracks. I would recommend buying several cans. Works well but doesn't cover a lot of space. I used about 3-4 cans both times in a 2 bedroom house, but I sprayed down every surface, cabinet, curtains, couches, seats. Used it spring of 2016, haven't seen a flea since. Makes sure to treat your yard with something as well, this is for indoors. Also I would recommend Diatomaceous Earth for mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Amdonim

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! One can treated my entire 1000 sq ft house and gave me some leftover in case I needed to sweep the place with it again. Killed a lot of the fleas instantly. What it didn’t get the first round, it took care of with the resweep. EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Stininger

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: By the time we realized we had a flea problem, it was pretty much out of hand. We tried all the natural products. Nothing put a dent in it. Finally, broken and desperate, we tried Precor Plus. It works. We followed directions religiously. My only quibble is that allegedly one can will take care of a 2,000 square foot house. Nope. We have a 1,500 square foot house and it took us five cans to do the house thoroughly. We have a lot of upholstered furniture and drapes. Plus most of the house is carpeted. But I don't care how many cans it took - the flea problem was solved.
customer_reviews.author: SkateSand

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I was about to lose my mind because of those blood suckers. Couldn't relax at home on the couch nor bed is such pain. Always wore whites and wrapped tapes around my ankles constantly checked if there are any hitchhikers:( After a month of misery and $$$ spent for products (one of them was recommended by the vet.) I finally found this product. Read reviews and decided to give it a chance. It WORKED!!!! It's been almost a month. I saw one flea (I'm not sure if it was a surviver or came from somewhere.) and that's it. This is the must get product if you have flea situation.
customer_reviews.author: csnmum

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had a flea infestation & tried soooo many different things with no improvement over 6 months. My poor daughter got the worst of it. I bought two of these for the house. I didn't even finish both. It only took about 2 days to get rid of them!!!! So far it's only been about 4 days but we haven't been bit at all! I will say that I did treat the cats & dogs with Flea Free Food Supplement but I am certain the majority of it is due to the Precor spray. I cannot recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: JMor

customer_reviews.title: This is what the pros use, its poison but it'll kill them dead
customer_reviews.text: Highly toxic and you need to clear out for about 4-6 hours. It is a poison, let's not beat around the bush, but it is also the most effective flea killer for sale on Amazon. The exterminator I paid good money for uses the Precor 2625 which is super effective, but also causes damage to furnishings. Use this, it will kill the fleas in just a couple treatments. Don't fall for the "all natural" gimmick sprays, they do not work trust me. This does.
customer_reviews.author: Noisyturtle

customer_reviews.title: ... while their owner is on vacation were having a bad flea problem
customer_reviews.text: Two cats that I watch while their owner is on vacation were having a bad flea problem. Although the owner treated the cats topically, she didn't treat the infestation in her small studio apartment. This took care of the problem with one application in just one month. I put the two cats in the bathroom while I treated the rest of the apartment, focusing mainly on a large area rug in the otherwise hardwood floored space. I waited a half hour before letting the cats out, who suffered no ill effect. This took care of the problem that the monthly topical treatment could not do on its own.
customer_reviews.author: MelBone72

customer_reviews.title: Fleas!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with intentions of using it as a perimeter spray inside our house. An animal had died under out house and had fleas. This was about the same time we had a new HVAC unit installed and the installers carried the fleas back inside which infested our has and 2 cats. After a long battle of foggers and sprays I purchased this was one of my last purchases. I sprayed the perimeter with this and then mopped with another organic spray along with a flea trap. The most important thing to do is always vacuum. In the end I feel this helped kill them in those hard to reach places. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TWDesigns

customer_reviews.title: Effectiveness Hard to Quantify but Appears Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: We cannot recommend this product. Our cat is a mostly inside cat that occasionally goes outside with us. This year, she developed a flea problem. We used this product and followed the directions to the letter. It's difficult to say whether Precor 2000 Plus works well or not because we cannot do a survey of fleas and flea eggs in the nooks and crannies of various fabrics and coarse surfaces. However, our flea problem seems unimproved after religious use of this spray, despite extraordinary steps to avoid reintroduction of fleas. Therefore, we cannot recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RNE

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Many of us are not comfortable with broadcasting any potentially harmful chemicals where we live. When it comes to a choice between seeing your four legged friends miserable, biting and kicking their fur off because of fleas, or wiping the pests out, this is an effective solution. Just prescription spot on treatment doesn't completely eliminate the interlopers. This cleans up the indoor environment. Precor has been around for a while and works well. Two treatments a few weeks apart and it's finished till the fall season. I isolated the areas for a couple of days immediately after treatment and have seen no adverse reactions after a few weeks. A relief for all concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Tyge

customer_reviews.title: Finally winning the battle.
customer_reviews.text: Had horrible months of flea fighting this year. 3 cats absolutely miserable. Discovered fleas all over my ankles in a closed off room with hard wood floors! Picked this up, squirted the floors, concentrating above the cracks in the floor. Closed the room up and waited the recommended 14 days. Nary a flea to be had. Still fought them a bit with flea drops and generic Capstar (bought here, 12 pills for $5!) and we've pretty much won the battle. Now, to attack the winter mice, since the cats could care less about them....
customer_reviews.author: CEFreeman

customer_reviews.title: Instant Death in a Can (for bugs)
customer_reviews.text: This stuff WORKS. The first time I bought it was for a flea infestation due to my roommate's cats. I sprayed this throughout the apartment, and I immediately saw a dramatic reduction in the number of fleas on the cats. Unfortunately the fleas did come back eventually, but I think this was due to inconsistent host-side flea treatment. I've since moved to a new apartment, but I still keep a can or two of this around for the occasional insect pest. Any bug that comes into contact with this spray dies almost instantly. It's great for eliminating ant trails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have done the trick
customer_reviews.text: I don't know that it was an "infestation" but all I know is my dog had fleas and they kept coming back. I never saw them anywhere except for a few on my dog, but I bombed the house with this stuff before leaving for a 3 day weekend. Immediately gave the dog a flea bath, and they haven't been back since.
customer_reviews.author: SomethingWhitty

customer_reviews.title: Poor delivery system.
customer_reviews.text: Though I followed all the fine print instructions; shake well; turn upside down, etc...the result was that, in addition to some fine mist, large splashes of white liquid went all over every surface. Nasty. And I see in the morning that the white spots became bumps in one of the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Barrup

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This product is the ONLY product that has really broken the flea cycle! Last year fleas took over before I could find aproduct that kills eggs. This year, I sprayed it lightly on my rugs and outside the house where my dogs nap the instant I saw the first flea. It stopped the cycle in its tracks. Combined with bathing my dogs, damp mopping every few days and vaccuming daily, the fleas are gone. They never had a chance. I give 90% of the credit to Precor. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kuvasz

customer_reviews.title: Best product for fleas with hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: I have hardwood floors and have had to fight fleas twice now...love this product!!! I've done a lot of trial and errors and wasted money on crap that was suppose to work...blah!! This was the last item I was going to try and it worked!!! Fleas can hide in the cracks in the wood. This killed them!! Literally it was flea-magedon!! Killed them all! We did have to put down the second coating a week or two later. And it was easy to do. Definitely recommend if you have hard wood floors!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Works like no other brand for fleas and tics
customer_reviews.text: When I first notice a tic or a flea Zoecon Precor 2000 Plus is always on hand. I found this brand many years ago & always have a can in stock because it’s a given living in Florida bugs & critters can be a problem
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Howell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for flees and other insects
customer_reviews.text: Well, all i can say that this stuff saved me 2 nd time from flee invasion. 4 large breed dogs. I "laundred" all and sprayed house with this stuff. 2-3days and tbey fully stopped biting themselves, you kniw how they "bite flees out". I noticed flees very early this time, after week-end visits to tractor supply and lowes. Took action on wednesday. Last time i had to spray 3 weeks / 1xweekly/ and all acreage we have with all outdoor furniture.
customer_reviews.author: stella

customer_reviews.title: An Effective Premise Flea Spray that kills eggs, too
customer_reviews.text: This effectively killed fleas and their eggs in about 5 to 10 days. I noticed some improvement after a day or two. Do NOT use on pets or humans. I got rid of them for the rest of the flea season. You also need to treat your pets with a safe, veterinarian approved spot on product. You may have to spray again according to directions.. Vacuuming helps, but remember to immediately change and disposed of the bag outside, because there may probably be live fleas and flea eggs in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: MGirard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Literally stop reading reviews and buy it. I had a small room, so I only bought one can. Sprayed it a bit heavy the night I received it. I honestly sprayed it lightly at first because I was afraid of what the smell would be. It doesn’t smell bad at all. So I sprayed again. Let sit for 24 hours. Vacuumed. Been back in several times to check for “new” ones that may have hatched. I’ve seen zero evidence that any exist. I’ll honestly keep on hand. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and works right away
customer_reviews.text: I used this along with another spray and finally got rid of every flea in my house!! We had a kitten given to us that had fleas and I tried everything. It wasn’t until I got this spray that we got results immediately. Flea free for months!!
customer_reviews.author: dscott

customer_reviews.title: What if this doesn't work?
customer_reviews.text: I have bad fleas in one bedroom that nobody goes into anymore. The first and second weeks, I emptied a can ofin the room (one can is supposed to treat 2,000 square feet). These last two weeks, I have useddiluted at 1 oz per gallon and I soaked the rug both times. Still, as soon as I step into the room, I can look down at my legs and see 10 to 20 fleas crawling around on each. What do I do?
customer_reviews.author: jp2code

customer_reviews.title: Great, Effective for fleas
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Nasty Flea problem in the house and yard. Only needed one application in the house, and they were gone. Outside I used a hose and bottle spray all purpose kind. I noticed a few fleas hitching a ride on my white socks so I used Precor in the patio table area. Took out the spiders also. . I used Precor in the garage. It is also knocking out German cockroaches weeks after I applied it.
customer_reviews.author: Tool Time Guy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based one the reviews. For some reason The seresto collars I have used for years stopped working on my bulldog. We had a flea outbreak within our home. We needed help so I purchased this hoping it would help. I followed the instructions and felt confident that we had gotten rid of the fleas. However, the product helped, but did not fully get rid of the problem. It worked as good as all the other products, but was twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Spray dispensing design is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: ?Good product (I don't know yet, but I assume it works)? Delivery system is terrible. It is essentially impossible to spray the product as directed without getting it on your hand. It is unnecessary and a design issue. (I DID use PPE, but this shouldn't be an issue).
customer_reviews.author: okctech

customer_reviews.title: Maybe inside house for furnitures
customer_reviews.text: i'm from dominican repulic, i move on recently and the previous residents haved a dog outside on the garage. So there i tried this and other products, i spray them directly and observe their behaviors. the get dizzy but wait for like 5 minutes and they still walk and look not close to dead. so i tried with Home Chlorine and they died in like 1 min.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Anibal Herrera Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!
customer_reviews.text: After months of battle, even bombing, this stuff finally did the trick! If I ever face flees again, this is will be the first product I use. I will recommend it to everyone! THANK YOU!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Believe the other people in the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading pages of reviews of various anti flea and anti bug, in general, pesticides. You will find everyone in agreement that this product worked when all else failed. I, striving to live a life of practical and cost efficient productivity, decided to take the advice and only buy this. No lie, it does smell like WD-40, but it is not too bad and the smell is far more bearable than a continuing flea problem. My cat brought them in. It took about 1-2 weeks but I noticed results in one day. It keeps decreasing the population from there. All in all, great product. Worth every penny. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good riddance evil fleas!
customer_reviews.text: I fought the good fight with herbal remedies and diatomaceous earth around the house and Frontline on my dog and two cats. But those evil buggers persisted. I washed everything daily. Vacuumed several times a week. Still they persisted. This stuff did the trick. While I’m sad it probably also killed helpful insects like spiders in my place. It’s been such a relief to use the flea comb and not find any on my pets. The fleas went crazy hours after I sprayed and I had one jump on me and another bit my inner thigh six times, but after that they have disappeared. Good riddance to the most evil and persistent little blood suckers ever.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Abbruzzese

customer_reviews.title: Really effective product for flea control and prevention
customer_reviews.text: The first time I see my dogs scratching in the spring, I know it is flea season. I spray this on their beds, on the area of the carpets that they lay and in my garage (no fleas there but plenty of spiders). This product really works. Of course for effective flea control, you need to spray your yard too and I've had less luck finding something as effective in that area. I also highly recommend the. They do a great job of protecting the house and eradicating any fleas that might be hanging around.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Worked in one application/ No strong smell
customer_reviews.text: First, I rarely review a product. This spray was excellent. My cat and I battled those horrible creatures for a solid month after an infestation. I had tried several other things... home sprays, pet spray, flea shampoo (not at the same time, of course) and diatomaceous earth which is a natural product. I had some success but could not get rid of them. ONE spraying of my home with this product, following all directions on the can and I have not seen a single flea. It did NOT have a strong smell as other home sprays have. It's been a few days now since treatment and still no fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps
customer_reviews.text: I guess it worked as the day before I used it when I vacuumed I could see a couple fleas in the canister. Since then I haven’t seen any did a follow up spray just in case. Although I do still see my cats itching a little it’s not as bad as it was. I felt very uncomfortable using such strong chemicals but felt I had no choice. Just want to get these pesky bugs off my babies.
customer_reviews.author: Linn

customer_reviews.title: you NEED it pretty much immediately and not a week later
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works 100%. One can was just enough for my 1000 sqft home. Use it as instructed and you will see success. I treated all my carpets and furniture with this, along with treating my dog and two cats (I give my dog a Bravecto chew and the cats both wear Soresto collars) and washing all linens in hot water. Stubborn Oklahoma fleas are gone! My only gripe about this product is that it isn't a Prime product so the shipping time can take forever. When you need flea killer, you NEED it pretty much immediately and not a week later. I would order another one just to have on hand for next season!
customer_reviews.author: Lovay

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for decades. Used to buy at an exterminator company. This price is much more cost effective. I simply spray this onto my rugs, dog bedding, even on bare floors (the mist is super fine), let thoroughly dry before allowing pets or humans back into the rooms. I like to vacuum after it dries to get any dead fleas and such off. Love this stuff, it works instantly.
customer_reviews.author: MAGA Marion

customer_reviews.title: Very strong/toxic
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it works but this stuff is scary! I sprayed one room (my baby’s nursery) and within 2 minutes started feeling like I was getting high from the product. I ran outside and got fresh air. My husband sealed off the gap under the door so the smell wouldn’t vacate our entire house, which it already did. I’m too scared to spray it again to be honest and won’t be letting my baby in his room for a LONG time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your $ on store bought bombs and foggers. This stuff is amazing! We used it 2 summers in a row after trying everything available in stores. It really does work! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: And they are gone!! So Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally!! We tried everything! The green stuff, the orange stuff, the bombs, the powder, even the darn light! These stupid suckers that I haven't had to deal with in YEARS were not giving up! 2 cans of this, with 3 days between them WORKED and they haven't been back since!! Thank goodness!! So Happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda V

customer_reviews.title: When you hire a company to come spray the inside ...
customer_reviews.text: When you hire a company to come spray the inside of your house for fleas, THIS is the stuff they will bring but THEY will charge you $200 to spray it. I learned that the hard way. It absolutely works, as long as you vacuum every other day for 2 weeks, and is much more affordable to buy yourself than have the "pros" do it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Morris

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Like Always
customer_reviews.text: This was no longer available locally, so I first tried a spray liquid (Black Flag Flea & Tick) bought from a local Big Box hardware store. The Black Flag Product was largely ineffective even after using half a gallon on the bedroom alone. When the PreCor arrived via Amazon, it was applied immediately and the fleas were gone in a week. Highly recommended. Have been using as needed for years.
customer_reviews.author: TexasHockeyFan

customer_reviews.title: Worked extremely well!
customer_reviews.text: Worked extremely well, didn’t have a strong bad odor like I expected, it smells a bit like black licorice. It dried quickly but did temporarily leave some residue on the tile. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Call it a fogger not aero spray smh
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I expected. I was misinformed when ordering this spray which is not even a spray, it’s a fogger. I was expecting to buy a spray like how the expert pest control uses to treat my home without having to take my pets out the home because I’m disabled so it’s difficult to bring all my pets Out for hours to let the fogger treat and then back in. I was highly disappointed about this feature because the description says aerosol spray so why not think it’s a spray?? Not my fault for not thinking it was a fogger.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Best flea spray we tried.
customer_reviews.text: We tried so many different flea sprays this summer after moving into a house with fleas. This product was the best. We sprayed twice with 2 weeks in between to make sure we got every flea. Haven't seen any since! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shea Magill

customer_reviews.title: Buy it buy it now! This stuff works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product had used 2 previous flea bombs from other companies and the fleas seemed to multiply and get bigger. This stuff kicked their little asses for real dead ass a door nail! If you got major flea problem this is the product for you!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Kimball

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I Have a pet free home so imagine my surprize when I started getting eaten up by fleas. After reading the reviews I thought this was a miracle product. I followed directions and left for a few hours. After being home for 10 minutes I saw 2 fleas on my foot. Will give it another try but not too optomistic. i am updating this review. after the last 2 fleas I have not seen another. I am thrilled that they are all gone!
customer_reviews.author: S. J. HAUCK

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY YOUR ONLY GO TO FOR FLEAS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS YOUR GO TO FOR ANY FLEA INFESTATION!!! DON'T waste your $MONEY$ on any thing else you'll just be wasting it!! This is the third season that I've had to use this spray. As soon as I saw one this is my first order on Amazon this summer. If you're searching for anything to combat fleas please listen to these reviews there is nothing negative about this product unless you want something that's more environmentally friendly. Unfortunately you can't find anything that's environmentally friendly and that combats these little buggers. 100% recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: TR & SM

customer_reviews.title: Kills bugs dead.
customer_reviews.text: Kills fleas....just be sure vacate any room you use it in for a couple hours. I rescued two stray cats, they brought some unwanted friends along with them. Nothing I tried to get rid of the fleas was working... ordered this stuff and "nuked" the house with it. Haven't seen a flea since...come to think of it, haven't seen too many other bugs either... Another positive note, haven't seen where this has caused any weird growths on the family yet. ;)
customer_reviews.author: -Clint-

customer_reviews.title: This is all you need!
customer_reviews.text: We had tried every best selling flea killer on Amazon for months and this is the only thing that got rid of them. After 3 applications every other week we haven't seen fleas in a couple months. We were infested. Our bathroom our living room allí the bedrooms! You couldn't walk without a flea hopping on you! Now we're flea free!
customer_reviews.author: Rodríguez Family

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: after trying the bombs you can buy in any store three times with no luck we found this....one application the flees along with every of bug that crawls was eradicated.
customer_reviews.author: William Cain

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: I had to use this twice but that's always the case because the eggs hatch and then you have to reapply. Since the second application we seem to be flea free. I had even seen a couple for a week after the second application but they were dying when I saw them. This in combination with Frontline worked for me with one dog and 3 cats.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: YES!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like using this stuff. It goes on so easy. The only difficulty I have is applying it: I may be putting it on too heavy. You only need to spray a little mist but I find if I move my hand too quickly when spraying I don't apply any. Oh well. It works wonderfully! I have used it as the label directs and have not had any return visitors. In-laws either. :) Just kidding.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: After a couple months of trying to figure out the best treatment for fleas I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works, no lie. I just moved to the midwest from the desert where I have had zero experience with fleas. After a couple months of trying to figure out the best treatment for fleas I purchased this. I have picked up the common areas, vacuumed (as apparently fleas are active after vacuuming) and then spray this. I've left the area vacant and removed my dog's water bowl for about 4 hours and it has worked really well, better than everything else I have tried. For the future I will recommend getting dogs on Frontline and using this product, it legit works.
customer_reviews.author: AMBER

customer_reviews.title: It fricken works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We live in apartment where lawns are not treated add to that we live in florida where it is always hot and perfect breeding for fleas. We have tried EVERYTHING. Nothing was getting rid of the fleas. We were covered in flea bites. Then I saw the reviews on this product and tried it. OMG it was amazing!!!! Gone.. like no fleas have been back and it has been weeks. The kids legs have healed and we are now getting flea free sleep. This stuff is amazing. Spray everything couches, chairs, floors, underneath everything and wait until dry then just vacuum every day for two weeks. And wholla no fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but does it work?!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. Flea infestation quite awful, could see them on white socks when I walked in carpet. Vacuumed throughly, treated cat with another product. Treated all rooms: floors, upholstered furniture, beds, throw rugs. Easy to apply: used one and one half cans. Left home for a few hours. Thought product had worked, but still have active, adult fleas on me as I walk through my house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flea spray
customer_reviews.text: I tried others brands while waiting for this to arrive. the other products worked for a day or two, Reading all the precautions on the can, I was concerned and wondered about the odor. But this product has worked as others have said. no odor to detect. I hid the cat in another room and the spray was dried in an hour or so. it was worth the wait. Will use this product again as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It absolutely works
customer_reviews.text: With 3 cats the fleas were impossible. Zoecon Precor 2000 did away with them in a single application. It is labor intensive to use, I moved all furniture to one side of the room, sprayed and vacuumed, then moved it all to the other and repeated. After 2 years I have not seen a single flea return. It was well worth the work and my cats are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Sordillo

customer_reviews.title: Précis is THE only product that actually works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE ONLY product that has worked for my "fleamagedden" from HELL situation.... I've tried them ALL !!! Kudos to PRECOR!!! AND.... you can lock the kitties in the bathroom n put a towel under door n treat the areas you need to treat until dry... then let them out. IT does leave an oily residue at times but I just run a paper towel over the oily areas. IT kills fleas!!!! You do step outside when waiting for dry time.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: Actually works! You need to literally spray everything in the home, we even sprayed our leather couch and it didn’t affect it at all! Then wash all bedding, blankets, really anything that can be washed. Do flea baths on animals, and then spray again in a week. Worked great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The worse nightmare. I try everything but this product was ...
customer_reviews.text: Is the only product that kill flea in your house. My house was infected with thousands of cat flea. A friend bring a cat to my apartament and then they leave but the fleas stay, I went on vacation when I came back i had fleas all over my place. The worse nightmare. I try everything but this product was the only one that really kill fleas.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: After a long battle of what we consider Super Fleas, this is the only product I have found that truly works. We have gone through expensive pills, yard treatments, dips, baths, natural products, special lights, you name it. Nothing worked. Until I bought this. One can goes quite a long way and has seemed to last for some time. Our once out of control flea infestation is now under control and they are gone. I will purchase this product again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best
customer_reviews.text: Anytime our dog had any fleas over his first 7 years, a bath, a topical, or a pill from the vet fixed the problem. After 3 weeks of struggling to eliminate the fleas I became determined to find a fix and my research lead me to this line of products. This stuff is the real deal. Worth every penny. Even if your pet doesn’t have fleas now, buy some to keep on deck
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Wilds

customer_reviews.title: BETTER than what the vet gives you!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. We had been fight fleas in our apartment for over three months. This is the only thing that seems to have gotten them for good!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ebeth

customer_reviews.title: Knocks em out
customer_reviews.text: Kills the flea cycle better than anything I've found and haven't had a recurrence since April when I first used it. And I have pussy's galore.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Rigger

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past and it worked very well but the bottle I received from Amazon was virtually worthless. Started seeing fleas within a few hours of spraying and now they are just as bad as before only a week later.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Industrial Strength Flea Killer
customer_reviews.text: This stuff kills fleas. 100% for sure. It’s probably killing everything else it touches too, but at least we’ll all die without flea bites. Our house was infested, and we had tried everything. Precor finally got rid of the bugs. It smells awful and the label is full of warnings, but sanity comes at a price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L.

customer_reviews.title: no fun. It works for us whenever Aurelius sneaks out ...
customer_reviews.text: As long as you de-flea your pets, wash and shampoo everything that CAN be washed or shampooed...clothing, bedding, upholstery, carpets...THEN spray, it works for months. I have a lot of hardwood floors in my home. Since flea eggs drift with the air patterns (you walk, it pushes them to the side, where they eventually hatch), it is important you do a hands and knees cleaning. I know...no fun. It works for us whenever Aurelius sneaks out and brings home his flea buddies.
customer_reviews.author: caryzoo

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've used this product as I wanted to compare it to the one I've used for a decade. It words great and the first time and it doesn't have the overpowering smell my other one has! The price was way better than what I had been spending all these years for the other brand I used.
customer_reviews.author: JudyG46

customer_reviews.title: A miracle in a can against fleas!
customer_reviews.text: This saved my house from fleas when nothing else would. Throw that diatomaceous earth in the trash, dump the fogger and get a couple cans of this stuff. It got my sanity back!
customer_reviews.author: Technomancer

customer_reviews.title: Product appears to kill fleas
customer_reviews.text: I had a horrible flea infestation this summer and the pest control company I use was was not able to address the problem continually. I found this product to be highly rated. It worked well in addition to constant vacuuming and treating my cat. I learned that all have to be done in order to beat this scourge. It also appeared to be safe for the cat to be in the house, however, I kept her from going into the treated area for a few hours
customer_reviews.author: Lynda J. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Effective in flea control
customer_reviews.text: Having flea infestation is the worst. I have been facing that after I changed the apartment and the new one is full of it. I used this product based on reviews and its worth it. After applying it, i haven’t seen any live fleas yet, waiting for the next 2 weeks to see the result.
customer_reviews.author: SHOHANUZZAMAN SHOHAN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING !!!! I bought this product because my cat had fleas. I have hardwood floors with lots of cracks so I was pretty worried. This product not only killed the fleas (I also treated my cat with Comfortis ) but I haven't seen ANY bugs in my apartment. I also had palmetto bugs coming into my apartment. I was seeing one or two a week minimum. It's been 1 month now and I found 2 DEAD ones. This product really works. It's awesome and worth the price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Levin

customer_reviews.title: Must Have if you have fleas in your home!
customer_reviews.text: We've fought fleas off and on for the last year. This product is what finally won the battle! Works great. Well worth the price! Only wish I'd found it a year ago instead of wasting close to $1000 on so many other products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works.
customer_reviews.text: I researched flea sprays and reviews kept pointing to Precor as the one that works best. Couldn't find it in town so I ordered from Amazon. While waiting for the two day shipping I tried Sentry flea spray from Petco. The Sentry spray hardly made a difference but after we sprayed Precor (a few days later) the fleas were gone. It's been 2 weeks now and we haven't seen a single flea. This stuff works.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Beckman

customer_reviews.title: It killed larvae, where other products didn't
customer_reviews.text: Simply put - this worked quickly, where some powders and aggressive vacuuming/cleaning efforts had not been effective. The GF and I were frustrated in lead up to this, and massively relieved it worked - we followed as described on instructions.
customer_reviews.author: P. Antal

customer_reviews.title: Precor can ran out of propellant very quickly
customer_reviews.text: My can of Precor arrived partially charged and ran out of propellant before the can was even 3/4ths empty. I can’t speak about the effectiveness since the product won’t leave the can. I switched back to Vibrac Knockout Perimeter Spray; it costs a little more, but I’m able to use the whole can when spraying a room.
customer_reviews.author: J. Laizure

customer_reviews.title: Killed the fleas and no odor whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that finally killed the fleas in our house. We had been battling this problem for months. Thank you for putting such a great product out there!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Foley

customer_reviews.title: Works Better than Pest Control Service
customer_reviews.text: We have had some time getting rid of a flea infestation. We vacuumed multiples times a day and it kept getting worse. We then hired a pest control company to come out. It worked for about a week. I started looking for another solution. This one was recommended on a couple of sites. I gave it a try and it worked wonders. It has been months and after only one application we still do not have a problem. The instructions did recommend another application, but even though we bought it we did not apply it. I would recommend this to anyone having troubles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective compared to national brands
customer_reviews.text: I tried all sorts of flea spray from the supermarket. I think the fleas eat it up and laugh. Not with this. It zaps them dead and ends the infestation.
customer_reviews.author: Vince L.

customer_reviews.title: D. Earth + this stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: It works! I sprayed the area where my dog's kennel is. No more bites...on me nor the dog. I also sprayed my bedroom, even though the dog doesn't go in there. I would recommend you ensure proper ventilation is in the area. This spray is not heavy, but does have a lite "chemical" smell to it. Overall, I am glad I bought this product. Be sure to reapply every 2 weeks for a couple of months. I used Food Grade D. Earth as well. I am pretty sure it was Zoecon Precor that did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: So tried multiple bombs and sprays for the house and even paid a guy to come out and spray the house for $200 and will never again just because that's pretty hefty. This product is really good used it twice and definatelly saw my cats stop scratching. Great stuff, highly recommend and always have one as a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've used for killing fleas!
customer_reviews.text: I had a flea infestation in my apartment which kept track of the flea count each day by placing plates filled with a mixture of both water and dish soap to catch them. My average flea count each day for the month of May 2020 was 39.8. After spraying these spots where pets were on 3 different weekends, the flea count averaged at 4.8 per day. Now in July, the flea count is under 1 per day! This stuff is incredible for wiping out fleas and totally worth the money. Use this stuff once a week for 4-6 weeks, along with vaccuming, and your flea problem will be gone!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Halterman

customer_reviews.title: Cancelled the $350 exterminator
customer_reviews.text: Ever stand in a room and have fleas bite your ankles? I tried fogging and cheaper products and the fleas were still there. This stuff works. I had a quote from an exterminator for about 350 but this worked fine. SO grateful it worked.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Bookman

customer_reviews.title: This is a great item
customer_reviews.text: Thiscis an amazing product but it took ENTORELY TOO LONG TO SHIP i ended up wasting money on flea bombs because this took too long to arrive like seriously i dont even need it anymore and i cant return it but i digress its a good pproduct so im gladvi have it for next time but it was so much money and time wasted
customer_reviews.author: LEJ

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me. Waste of money. Raid worked better
customer_reviews.text: Spray didn’t work for me. I Also used the Precor foggers, the Martins and the Vipor sprays together and Still have fleas. I did see a decrease but two weeks later they were back so I repeated the process and a week later they are back like they never left and we haven’t had a dog in over 2 months. My advice is to hire someone cause the money I’ve spent on all of these products wasn’t worth it cause it didn’t eliminate the problem
customer_reviews.author: Mona Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I love Precor 2000 plus
customer_reviews.text: I love Precor 2000 plus. It works great for indoor flea and bug control. I spray it on my floor, pet bedding, and my mattress under my sheets. It kills fleas on contact and keep the number of them low in general. One can could treat one room at least three times.
customer_reviews.author: Myranda DiQuirico

customer_reviews.title: Flea control
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect but one of the better sprays out there. We had a problem and this product helped us get it under control. No unpleasant smell does not harm the animals fast drying and easy to use. Definitely will keep using it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Van Gorder

customer_reviews.title: Second can did not spray at all
customer_reviews.text: The spray stopped almost immediately. Contacted seller no response. This isn't the first time the can failed. Will be looking for another product to use. Seller unresponsive. When it works it is great. Seller never got back to me.
customer_reviews.author: RayF

product_meta.title: Zoecon Precor 2000 Plus Premise Spray, 16 oz.
product_meta.description: THIS IS WHAT THE PROFESSIONALS USE! Target Pests = fleas, ticks, ants, cockroaches Precor 2000 Plus Premise Spray is a premise spray that packs a fast adulticide punch with two adulticides, Phenothrin and Permethrin, along with the lasting effects of Precor IGR. Covers 2, 000 square feet. Fine mist, low odor formula that dries without leaving a residue. Water-based for better coverage. Heavier-than-air molecules go deep into the base of carpets and upholstery to control flea larvae. The best way to rid households of fleas and reduce callbacks. How It Works Precor 2000 Plus Premise Spray contains Permethrin and Phenothrin to kill adult fleas fast. It also contains Precor IGR to prevent reinfestation for up to seven months. Precor IGR penetrates deep into the base of carpet and upholstery fibers, where pre-adult fleas live. Precor IGR targets fleas in the egg and larval stages of development, preventing them from producing new infestations of breeding, biting adults. Application Sites: Homes, Garages, Kennels, Carpets, Rugs, Wood flooring, Tile, Drapery, Furniture, Cushions, Pet Sleeping & Bedding areas.
feature_bullets: Age Range Description - All Life Stages
